name: El escape du garagiste
description:
Welcome to Omega Station. As the new spacetech apprentice in our garage, you have been tasked with providing maintenance to the station’s craft. And today, it is the day you are charged with ensuring that no abnormal elements are present in their cargo. In case of encountering any hazardous elements, please report to your superior, and await for instructions. Our security protocols will ensure that nothing goes WRONG.

It's a point and click puzzle game made for the game jam FRAxARG 2020.

Team France :

- Audrey Amiable : Producer/ Game designer

- Julien Pacheco : Programmer

Team Argentina :

- Francisco Altomonte : Programmer

- Luz Djeordjian: Artist

- Sebastian Cova : Game designer

- Matias Carou : Music and  sound designer
